name: Zen Puzzle
description:
This is a puzzle I develop in Unity. For now, it contains more than 60 levels but I'm developing several additional levels, also contains a version for mobile and I want to add on steam soon, if you get the sales necessary here for the registration.

Features:

  • + 60 levels.
  • 4 game modes.
  • Relaxing atmosphere.
  • No timers or stress features.
  • Logic challenges.
  • Simple rules and intuitive gameplay.
  • Smooth difficulty increase, the more you play, the harder it will be!
  • Logic-based game with minimalist elements and simple controls.
  • Many enigmas to unlock and more coming soon all week!
  • Android and Windows Versions.

I would launch the game paid but I decided to leave free,  would love to hear your feedback and suggestions to improve this game!!!

Coming Soon:

  • More levels.
  • Achievements.
